text: Callum Hazzard is a professional rugby league footballer who plays as a for St Helens in the Super League. He has spent time on loan from Saints at the North Wales Crusaders in Betfed League 1. ==Career== Hazzard made his Super League début for Saints against the London Broncos in July 2019. ==References== ==External links== *St Helens profile *SL profile *Saints Heritage Society profile Category:Living people Category:Rugby league locks Category:St Helens R.F.C. players Category:1999 births
title: Callum Hazzard
